## Bio üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

**Sita Lujintanon is an epidemiologic-implementation researcher.** Her research aims to **promote equity in HIV care engagement** in Thailand and globally. She is highly interested in using epidemiologic methods to answer impactful questions with imperfect data and overcoming **missing data problems**, particularly related to missing outcomes due to loss to follow-up and competing event. She also has a growing interest in applying **observational-implementation research** approach to rapidly generate evidence to inform effective real-world interventions and policies.
